title: CMS Analysis Example (JSON Schema)

___auxiliary_measurements.description: Please provide information about the additional measurements included in your analysis concerning e.g. Trigger Efficiencies, Background Measurements, Systematic Uncertainties, MC Scale Factors, Object Efficiencies, Rates, Acceptance Corrections
___auxiliary_measurements.title: Auxiliary Measurement Workflow

___input_code_output.description: Please provide the n-tuples you used for your measurements
___input_code_output.title: n-tuple Production

___basic_info.description: Please provide some information relevant for all parts of the Analysis here
___basic_info.title: Basic Information

___os.description: Please provide information about your operation system
___os.title: Operation System

___people_info.description: Please provide information about your operation system
___people_info.title: People Involved

___main_measurements.description: Please provide information about the main measurements of your analysis
___main_measurements.title: Main Measurement Workflow

___post_n_tuple.description: Please provide information about the combination of measurements for the final results of your analysis
___post_n_tuple.title: Final Results

___input_datasets.description: Please list all datasets relevant for the Analysis here (including all datasets for all main and auxiliary measurements)
___input_datasets.title: Input Data

___primary_datasets.description: Please list all primary datasets here
___primary_datasets.title: Primary Datasets

___mc_sig_dataset.title: Monte Carlo Signal Datasets
